task.title: Preparing the Radiator Before Starting the Vehicle
task.shortdesc: Step-by-step process for properly filling the vehicle's with water before initial operation.

taskbody.prereq: Ensure clean water is available; muslin or straining cloth recommended if water quality is questionable

step.cmd: Fill radiator with clean, fresh water

substep.cmd: Strain water through muslin if cleanliness is uncertain.

step.stepresult: Water should overflow from the pipe when system is fully filled

step.cmd: Confirm water covers both radiator and cylinder water jackets

taskbody.result: Properly prepared radiator ready for vehicle operation

ul.li: Check water levels frequently during initial driving period
Prefer soft rain water over hard water with alkalies and salts
